channel.title: Can't let other computers connect to my server!
channel.description:
How do i put my 562 server online so every1 can play it? I got 2 computers, i already tried to put the server online on pc1 (windows 7), copied the client to pc2 (vista), changed the ip in client on pc2 in client.class to the ip of pc1, i builded and tried to run the client. The black command screen opens, it says 'ip:ip adress of pc1", the client opens, the loading starts but stucks at connecting to update server! Then the black command screen says: error_game_js5connect. Wtf!?Why doesn't it works?What did i forgot? Plz help me! I already tried portfowarding on pc1 and pc2 with the program µtorrent, it didn't work :(
I am sorry for my spelling errors
to moderators: if this is the wrong section, plz move in to the rigth one!
another question: how do i bumb my topic to the first page again if its on another page?

item.title: Can't let other computers connect to my server!

item.description:
@Rilex wrote:

Try portforward with µtorrent

item.title: Can't let other computers connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @Joker3 Joker^
item.description:
@Joker3 wrote:

Somewhere along the line of your ports it is blocking your ports me i normally use 43594 default

try add this to your unblocked ports list…

also what router are you running may i ask ?

Read full topic
